ques: 1. Who can be registered as a member of Learning Resource Center?
answ: MDIS Tashkent staff, students, Alumni and other independent esearchers are eligible to be registered for LRC services. The ID card acts as a Library borrower card. MDIST staff (administrative staff and lecturers and students have to come to Learning Resource Centre to register a membership. MDIS Tashkent ALUMNI and Independent Researchers can register a membership via following webpage.
